name: Lucky Football
description:
Lucky Football is Funny Casual Soccer Game Made For All Age Group.

How To Play?

1) Tap & Hold Your Finger to start the game

2) Move Your Ball along with the path

3) Protect Your Ball From The Obstacles 

4) Put the Ball inside the Goal Post To Complete The Mission

Best way to relax your mind you can play this game anywhere you want anytime you want. Invite your friend for download the game and challenge him to play the game.
